Original meaning 本义: Meaning rice tassel.

頴字的基本解释

頴
yǐng
见“颕”。

頴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐng］
［《廣韻》餘頃切，上静，以。］
“颖1”的繁体字。亦作“頴1”。
(1)禾尾；带芒的谷穗。
(2)物之尖端。
(3)毛笔头上尖锐的锋毫。
(4)指用笔书写。
(5)嫩芽；芽尖。
(6)比喻才智出众。
(7)指才智出众者。
(8)形容声音高。
(9)指刀把末端的圆镮。即刀镮。
(10)圆木枕。因睡久则歪，容易警觉，故也称警枕。

頴字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頴； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1405第05
【正字通】俗穎字。◎按字彙、正字通，頁部穎字外尚有潁穎熲三字。今遵說文穎歸禾部，潁歸水部，熲歸火部。㯋字雖說文所無，今亦攺歸木部。

頴字的源字形

頴字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Ying
yǐng
See "颕".
Ying
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐng］
["Guang Yun" Yu Qing cut, Shang Jing, to. ]
Traditional characters of "颖1". Also known as "Ying 1".
(1) Hewei; ears of corn with awns.
(2) The tip of things.
(3) The sharp points on the tip of the brush.
(4) Refers to writing with a pen.
(5) Tender buds; bud tips.
(6) Metaphor is brilliant.
(7) Refers to the talented person.
(8) Describe the high voice.
(9) Refers to the round trowel at the end of the knife handle. That is, the knife yong.
(10) Round wooden sleepers. Because it is crooked after sleeping for a long time, it is easy to be alert, so it is also called a police pillow.
Ying
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　頴; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1405 05
[Zhengzitong] Vulgar Yingzi. ◎According to the vocabulary, the orthographic link, there are three characters Yingyingxi besides the Ying word on the page. Today, Zun said that Wenying went to the He Department, Ying to the Water Department, and Xi to the Fire Department. Although the word 㯋 is not available in the text, it is now returned to Kibe.
